meanings.definition: Flossies (noun): a type of dental floss used for cleaning between teeth.
meanings.sent1: I always carry flossies in my bag for after meals.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended using flossies daily for oral hygiene.
meanings.sent3: When I ran out of flossies, I had to use a toothpick instead.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled like freshly used flossies.
meanings.sent5: The flossies glided smoothly between her teeth, removing any food particles.

meanings.definition: Flossies (verb): to clean between teeth using dental floss.
meanings.sent1: Remember to flossies after brushing your teeth.
meanings.sent2: She flossies diligently every night before bed.
meanings.sent3: He flossies so fast, it's like a dental dance routine.
meanings.sent4: Flossies your way to a healthier smile.
meanings.sent5: Flossies gently to avoid hurting your gums.

meanings.definition: Flossies (adjective): relating to or characteristic of dental floss.
meanings.sent1: The flossies container was colorful and easy to spot.
meanings.sent2: Her flossies routine kept her teeth healthy.
meanings.sent3: The flossies aisle in the store always smells minty fresh.
meanings.sent4: His smile had a flossies shine after the dentist visit.
meanings.sent5: The dentist praised her for her flossies dedication.
